description:
The Akudarama trio go to Kyoto in 900 to find Sugawara no Michizane. Once there, they hear cheering... and Michizane posing like an idol. Tsubuyakky wonders if he’s actually the god of education like he’s said to be. Bimajo falls for him instantly since he’s handsome, smart, and successful. Then Tokio and Calen show up and they have a quiz battle in order to get the Dynamond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gakumon no Kamisama Sugawara no Michizane no Bikkuri Dokkuri na Tensai Densetsu to wa!?
What Was the God of Education, Sugawara no Michizane`s Super Surprising Legend About Being a Genius?!
学問の神様菅原道真のビックリドッキリな天才伝説とは!?
